pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, July 26, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, July 26, 2017:

Chicoutimi, Quebec

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit l’Exposition agricole de Chicoutimi.

643 Rue Bégin
Chicoutimi, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:15 p.m.

Roberval, Quebec

6:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Souper dans les Rues, part of the 63rd Traversée internationale du lac St-Jean.

829, Boul. St. Joseph
Roberval, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:30 p.m.
